emails.subject: Product not working - URGENT
emails.body: Hi, I bought your product yesterday and it's not working at all. I've tried everything. This is very frustrating. Please help ASAP!

emails.subject: Interested in your services
emails.body: Hello, I came across your company and I'm interested in learning more about your automation services. Could you send me information about pricing and packages? We're a team of 50 people.

emails.subject: Meeting follow-up
emails.body: Hi! Thanks for the great meeting yesterday. As discussed, I'm sending over the documents we talked about. Let me know if you need anything else. Looking forward to working together!

emails.subject: This is unacceptable!!!
emails.body: I've been waiting for 2 WEEKS for a response to my support ticket #12345. This is absolutely unacceptable. I want a refund immediately and I'm going to leave a negative review if this isn't resolved TODAY.

emails.subject: Interview scheduling
emails.body: Dear Candidate, Thank you for your application. We would like to schedule an interview with you. Are you available next Tuesday at 2 PM or Wednesday at 10 AM? Please confirm your availability.

emails.subject: Weekly Newsletter - New Features!
emails.body: Check out our latest features! This week we released 3 amazing updates. Click here to learn more. Don't miss our special offer ending soon!

emails.subject: Can you help with custom integration?
emails.body: Hi there, we're using your platform and love it! However, we need a custom integration with Salesforce. Do you offer custom development services? What would be the timeline and cost for something like this?

emails.subject: Thank you!
emails.body: I just wanted to say thank you so much for the excellent customer service. Your team went above and beyond to help me. You've earned a customer for life!
